# [Marblegate Acquisition Corp. Announces the Separate Trading of its Class A Common Stock and Warrants, Commencing November 22, 2021 ](https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/marblegate-acquisition-corp-announces-the-separate-trading-of-its-class-a-common-stock-and-warrants-commencing-november-22-2021-301429290.html)

Nov 19, 2021 – Marblegate Acquisition Corp. (NASDAQ: [GATEU](https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/marblegate-acquisition-corp-announces-the-separate-trading-of-its-class-a-common-stock-and-warrants-commencing-november-22-2021-301429290.html#financial-modal)) (the "Company") announced today that, commencing November 22, 2021, holders of the units sold in the Company's initial public offering may elect to separately trade shares of the Company's Class A common stock and warrants included in the units. No fractional warrants will be issued upon separation of the units and only whole warrants will trade. 

[Read More](https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/marblegate-acquisition-corp-announces-the-separate-trading-of-its-class-a-common-stock-and-warrants-commencing-november-22-2021-301429290.html)

# [Marblegate Acquisition Corp. Announces Closing of $300,000,000 Initial Public Offering ](https://marblegateacquisition.com/marblegate-acquisition-corporation-announces-closing-of-300-million-initial-public-offering/)

Oct 5, 2021 – New York, NY - Marblegate Acquisition Corp. (NASDAQ: GATEU) (the “Company”) announced today that it closed its initial public offering of 30,000,000 units. The offering was priced at $10.00 per unit, resulting in gross proceeds of $300,000,000. The underwriters have a 45-day option to purchase up to an additional 4,500,000 units to cover over-allotments, if any.

[Read More](https://marblegateacquisition.com/marblegate-acquisition-corporation-announces-closing-of-300-million-initial-public-offering/)
